verses.verse: And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

<S%H1696>Speak<s%> unto the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and <S%H559>say<s%> unto <S%H935>them<s%>, When you be come into the <S%H776>land<s%> of your <S%H4186>habitations<s%>, which I give unto <S%H5414>you<s%>,

And will <S%H6213>make<s%> an offering by <S%H801>fire<s%> unto the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, a burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%>, or a <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> in <S%H6381>performing<s%> a <S%H5088>vow<s%>, or in a freewill <S%H5071>offering<s%>, or in your solemn <S%H4150>feasts<s%>, to <S%H6213>make<s%> a <S%H5207>sweet<s%> <S%H7381>smell<s%> unto the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, of the <S%H1241>herd<s%>, or of the <S%H6629>flock<s%>:

Then shall he that <S%H7126>offereth<s%> his <S%H7133>offering<s%> unto the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H7126>bring<s%> a food <S%H4503>offering<s%> of a tenth <S%H6241>deal<s%> of <S%H5560>flour<s%> <S%H1101>mingled<s%> with the <S%H7243>fourth<s%> part of an <S%H1969>hin<s%> of <S%H8081>oil<s%>.

And the <S%H7243>fourth<s%> part of an <S%H1969>hin<s%> of <S%H3196>wine<s%> for a drink <S%H5262>offering<s%> shall you <S%H6213>prepare<s%> with the burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%> or <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%>, for <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3532>lamb<s%>.

Or for a <S%H352>ram<s%>, you shall <S%H6213>prepare<s%> for a food <S%H4503>offering<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> tenth <S%H6241>deals<s%> of <S%H5560>flour<s%> <S%H1101>mingled<s%> with the <S%H7992>third<s%> part of an <S%H1969>hin<s%> of <S%H8081>oil<s%>.

And for a drink <S%H5262>offering<s%> you shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> the <S%H7992>third<s%> part of an <S%H1969>hin<s%> of <S%H3196>wine<s%>, for a <S%H5207>sweet<s%> <S%H7381>smell<s%> unto the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.

And when you <S%H6213>preparest<s%> a <S%H1121>bullock<s%> for a burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%>, or for a <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> in <S%H6381>performing<s%> a <S%H5088>vow<s%>, or peace <S%H8002>offerings<s%> unto the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>:

Then shall he <S%H7126>bring<s%> with a <S%H1241>bullock<s%> a food <S%H4503>offering<s%> of <S%H7969>three<s%> tenth <S%H6241>deals<s%> of <S%H5560>flour<s%> <S%H1101>mingled<s%> with <S%H2677>half<s%> an <S%H1969>hin<s%> of <S%H8081>oil<s%>.

And you shall <S%H7126>bring<s%> for a drink <S%H5262>offering<s%> <S%H2677>half<s%> an <S%H1969>hin<s%> of <S%H3196>wine<s%>, for an offering made by <S%H801>fire<s%>, of a <S%H5207>sweet<s%> <S%H7381>smell<s%> unto the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.
Thus shall it be <S%H6213>done<s%> for <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7794>bullock<s%>, or for <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H352>ram<s%>, or for a <S%H3532>lamb<s%>, or a <S%H5795>kid<s%>.
According to the <S%H4557>number<s%> that you shall <S%H6213>prepare<s%>, <S%H3602>so<s%> shall you <S%H6213>do<s%> to every <S%H259>one<s%> according to their <S%H4557>number<s%>.

All that are born of the <S%H249>country<s%> shall <S%H6213>do<s%> these things after this <S%H7126>manner<s%>, in offering an offering made by <S%H801>fire<s%>, of a <S%H5207>sweet<s%> <S%H7381>smell<s%> unto the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.

And if a <S%H1616>stranger<s%> <S%H1481>sojourn<s%> with <S%H8432>you<s%>, or whoever be among you in your <S%H1755>generations<s%>, and will <S%H6213>offer<s%> an offering made by <S%H801>fire<s%>, of a <S%H5207>sweet<s%> <S%H7381>smell<s%> unto the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>; as you <S%H6213>do<s%>, so he shall <S%H6213>do<s%>.

<S%H259>One<s%> <S%H2708>ordinance<s%> shall be both for you of the <S%H6951>congregation<s%>, and also for the <S%H1616>stranger<s%> that <S%H1481>stays<s%> with <S%H2708>you<s%>, an ordinance for <S%H5769>ever<s%> in your <S%H1755>generations<s%>: as you <S%H1616>are<s%>, so shall the stranger be <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.
<S%H259>One<s%> <S%H8451>law<s%> and <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H4941>manner<s%> shall be for <S%H1616>you<s%>, and for the stranger that stays with <S%H1481>you<s%>.
And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,
<S%H1696>Speak<s%> unto the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and <S%H559>say<s%> unto <S%H935>them<s%>, When you come into the <S%H776>land<s%> where I bring <S%H935>you<s%>,
Then it shall <S%H398>be<s%>, that, when you eat of the <S%H3899>bread<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%>, you shall offer <S%H7311>up<s%> an heave <S%H8641>offering<s%> unto the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.

You shall offer <S%H7311>up<s%> a <S%H2471>cake<s%> of the <S%H7225>first<s%> of your <S%H6182>dough<s%> for an heave <S%H8641>offering<s%>: as you do the heave <S%H8641>offering<s%> of the <S%H1637>threshingfloor<s%>, so shall you heave <S%H7311>it<s%>.
Of the <S%H7225>first<s%> of your <S%H6182>dough<s%> you shall <S%H5414>give<s%> unto the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> an heave <S%H8641>offering<s%> in your <S%H1755>generations<s%>.
And if you have <S%H7686>erred<s%>, and not <S%H6213>observed<s%> all these <S%H4687>commandments<s%>, which the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H1696>spoken<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>,

Even all that the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H6680>commanded<s%> you by the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, from the <S%H3117>day<s%> that the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H1973>Moses<s%>, and from now on among your <S%H1755>generations<s%>;

Then it shall <S%H6213>be<s%>, if anything be committed by <S%H7684>ignorance<s%> outside the <S%H5869>knowledge<s%> of the <S%H5712>congregation<s%>, that all the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> shall <S%H6213>offer<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H1121>young<s%> <S%H6499>bullock<s%> for a burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%>, for a <S%H5207>sweet<s%> <S%H7381>smell<s%> unto the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, with his food <S%H4503>offering<s%>, and his drink <S%H5262>offering<s%>, according to the <S%H4941>manner<s%>, and <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H8163>kid<s%> of the <S%H5795>goats<s%> for a sin <S%H2403>offering<s%>.

And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall make an <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for all the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and it shall be <S%H5545>forgiven<s%> <S%H7684>them<s%>; for it is ignorance: and they shall <S%H935>bring<s%> their <S%H7133>offering<s%>, a sacrifice made by <S%H801>fire<s%> unto the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, and their sin <S%H2403>offering<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, for their <S%H7684>ignorance<s%>:

And it shall be <S%H5545>forgiven<s%> all the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and the <S%H1616>stranger<s%> that <S%H1481>stays<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> <S%H5971>them<s%>; seeing all the people were in <S%H7684>ignorance<s%>.

And if <S%H259>any<s%> <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H2398>sin<s%> through <S%H7684>ignorance<s%>, then he shall <S%H7126>bring<s%> a she <S%H5795>goat<s%> of the <S%H1323>first<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> for a sin <S%H2403>offering<s%>.

And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall make an <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for the <S%H5315>soul<s%> that sins <S%H7683>ignorantly<s%>, when he <S%H2398>sins<s%> by <S%H7684>ignorance<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, to make an <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for <S%H5545>him<s%>; and it shall be forgiven him.

You shall have <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H8451>law<s%> for him that <S%H6213>sins<s%> through <S%H7684>ignorance<s%>, both for him that is <S%H249>born<s%> among the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and for the <S%H1616>stranger<s%> that <S%H1481>stays<s%> among <S%H8432>them<s%>.

But the <S%H5315>soul<s%> that <S%H6213>does<s%> anything <S%H7311>presumptuously<s%>, whether he be born in the <S%H249>land<s%>, or a <S%H4480>stranger<s%>, the same <S%H1442>blasphemes<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>; and that <S%H5315>soul<s%> shall be cut <S%H3772>off<s%> from <S%H7130>among<s%> his <S%H5971>people<s%>.

Because he has <S%H959>despised<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, and has <S%H6565>broken<s%> his <S%H4687>commandment<s%>, that <S%H5315>soul<s%> shall <S%H3772>utterly<s%> be cut <S%H3772>off<s%>; his iniquity shall be upon <S%H5771>him<s%>.

And while the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> were in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>, they <S%H4672>found<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> that <S%H7197>gathered<s%> <S%H6086>sticks<s%> upon the <S%H7676>sabbath<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%>.
And they that <S%H4672>found<s%> him <S%H7197>gathering<s%> <S%H6086>sticks<s%> <S%H7126>brought<s%> him unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%>, and unto all the <S%H5712>congregation<s%>.
And they <S%H3240>put<s%> him in <S%H4929>custody<s%>, because it was not <S%H6567>declared<s%> what should be done to <S%H6213>him<s%>.

And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, The <S%H376>man<s%> shall be <S%H4191>surely<s%> put to <S%H4191>death<s%>: all the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> shall <S%H7275>stone<s%> him with <S%H68>stones<s%> <S%H2351>outside<s%> the <S%H4264>camp<s%>.

And all the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> <S%H3318>brought<s%> him <S%H2351>outside<s%> the <S%H4264>camp<s%>, and <S%H7275>stoned<s%> him with <S%H68>stones<s%>, and he <S%H4191>died<s%>; as the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%>.
And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

<S%H1696>Speak<s%> unto the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and <S%H559>bid<s%> them that they <S%H6213>make<s%> them <S%H6734>fringes<s%> in the <S%H3671>borders<s%> of their <S%H899>garments<s%> throughout their <S%H1755>generations<s%>, and that they <S%H5414>put<s%> upon the <S%H6734>fringe<s%> of the <S%H3671>borders<s%> a <S%H6616>cord<s%> of <S%H8504>blue<s%>:

And it shall be unto you for a <S%H6734>fringe<s%>, that you may <S%H7200>look<s%> upon <S%H2142>it<s%>, and remember all the <S%H4687>commandments<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, and <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H8446>them<s%>; and that you seek not <S%H310>after<s%> your own <S%H3824>heart<s%> and your own <S%H5869>eyes<s%>, <S%H310>after<s%> which you use to go a <S%H2181>whoring<s%>:
That you may <S%H2142>remember<s%>, and <S%H6213>do<s%> all my <S%H4687>commandments<s%>, and <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H6918>holy<s%> unto your <S%H430>God<s%>.

I am the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>, which brought you <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, to be your <S%H430>God<s%>: I am the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>.
